name: Ginger Mint Tea
description: A soothing hot drink for cold; but also for relaxation and digestion
directions: Finely slice the ginger into thin rounds/strips
Strip the stems of the fresh mint
In a saucepan or a water boiler, bring 1 cup of water to boil
Pour the water into a cup, steep in the finely sliced ginger and sprigs of mint for 3-5 minutes
